net.happybrackets.core

Class OSCUDPReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.happybrackets.core.OSCUDPReceiver

  • public class OSCUDPReceiver
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple OSC Receiver without all the overhead. Opens a socket and reads it

      • addOSCListener

        public void addOSCListener(de.sciss.net.OSCListener listener)
        Registers a listener that gets informed about incoming messages. You can call this both when listening was started and stopped.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to register

      • removeOSCListener

        public void removeOSCListener(de.sciss.net.OSCListener listener)
        Unregisters a listener that gets informed about incoming messages
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to remove from the list of notified objects.
